text: The Kansas City metropolitan area surrounds the city of Kansas City, Missouri. It includes 14 counties in both Missouri and Kansas. With a population of 2.2 million people, it is the second largest metropolitan area in Missouri behind Greater St. Louis. However, the Kansas city metropolitan area gained population from 2020 to 2024. The St. Louis metropolitan area lost population. == References == Category:Kansas City, Missouri Category:Metropolitan areas of the United States
title: Kansas City metropolitan area
